verses.verse: וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <S%H559><s%> thou shalt say בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And in that day הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> I אוֹדְךָ֣ <S%H3034><s%> I will praise יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אָנַ֖פְתָּ <S%H599><s%> thee though thou wast angry בִּ֑י יָשֹׁ֥ב <S%H7725><s%> is turned away אַפְּךָ֖ <S%H639><s%> with me thine anger וּֽתְנַחֲמֵֽנִי׃ <S%H5162><s%> and thou comfortedst

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold אֵ֧ל <S%H410><s%> Behold God יְשׁוּעָתִ֛י <S%H3444><s%> [is] my salvation אֶבְטַ֖ח <S%H982><s%> I will trust וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶפְחָ֑ד <S%H6342><s%> and not be afraid כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָזִּ֤י <S%H5797><s%> [is] my strength וְזִמְרָת֙ <S%H2176><s%> and [my] song יָ֣הּ <S%H3050><s%> for the LORD יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> JEHOVAH וַֽיְהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> has become לִ֖י לִֽישׁוּעָֽה׃ <S%H3444><s%> he also is become my salvation

וּשְׁאַבְתֶּם־ <S%H7579><s%> shall ye draw מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> water בְּשָׂשׂ֑וֹן <S%H8342><s%> Therefore with joy מִמַּעַיְנֵ֖י <S%H4599><s%> out of the wells הַיְשׁוּעָֽה׃ <S%H3444><s%> of salvation

וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֞ם <S%H559><s%> shall ye say בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And in that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הוֹד֤וּ <S%H3034><s%> Praise לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God קִרְא֣וּ <S%H7121><s%> call בִשְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> upon his name הוֹדִ֥יעוּ <S%H3045><s%> declare בָֽעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> among the people עֲלִֽילֹתָ֑יו <S%H5949><s%> his doings הַזְכִּ֕ירוּ <S%H2142><s%> make mention כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for נִשְׂגָּ֖ב <S%H7682><s%> is exalted שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> that his name

זַמְּר֣וּ <S%H2167><s%> Sing יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for גֵא֖וּת <S%H1348><s%> excellent things עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> for he hath done [מְיֻדַּעַת כ] (מוּדַ֥עַת <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge ק) זֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> throughout הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in all the earth

צַהֲלִ֥י <S%H6670><s%> Cry out וָרֹ֖נִּי <S%H7442><s%> and shout יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> thou inhabitant צִיּ֑וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For גָד֥וֹל <S%H1419><s%> for great בְּקִרְבֵּ֖ךְ <S%H7130><s%> in the midst קְד֥וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> [is] the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel פ
